#include<iostream>
#include<string>
#include<sstream>
using namespace std;

int ARR[10000000],arr[10000000];

long int lim[10000005];

int main()
{
    int t;
    long int n,k,a,c,i,j,ans,save;
    cin >> t;
    lim[0]=0;
    for(i=1;i<=1000000;i++)
    {
        save=i;
        long int c=0;
        while(save>0)
        {
            a=save%10;
            arr[c++]=a;
            save/=10;
        }
        for(j=c-1,k=lim[i-1];j>=0;j--,k++)
            ARR[k]=arr[j];
        lim[i]=lim[i-1]+c;
    }
    while(t--)
    {
        cin >> n >> k;
        save=k;
        c=0;
        while(save>0)
        {
            a=save%10;
            arr[c++]=a;
            save/=10;
        }
		for(i=0;i<c/2;i++)
		{
			int temp=arr[i];
			arr[i]=arr[c-i-1];
			arr[c-i-1]=temp;
		}
       
       long int ans=0;

        for(i=0;i<lim[n];i++)
        {
            if(ARR[i]==arr[0])
            {
                j=1;
                save=i+1;
                while(j<c && save<lim[n])
                {
                    if(ARR[save]!=arr[j])
                        break;
                    j++;
                    save++;
                }
                if(j==c)
                    ans++;
            }
        }
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
